title: Alpha Client Hex Tech Chest
body: I was looking through my champions seeing which I can still get a Hex Tech Chest for before the season ends, but I realized that the icons didn't appear. I'm just putting this out there because this would be something that would be rather helpful in the alpha client instead of going back into the previous client, checking, then coming back to the alpha client.

replies.body:
Features are getting added to the Alpha Client quite frequently, but we can't do it all at once. I'm sure you'll see this feature, among many others with the final release of the new client when it launches.

Let me know if you have any questions.
